sentences.en: Although it is unjust, he thought.
sentences.cn: 然而这是不公平的, 他想.

sentences.en: An unjust cause finds meagre [ little ] support .
He submitted to the unjust treatment.
sentences.cn: 他屈服于这种不公平的待遇.

sentences.en: How odd life was, how unfathomable, how profoundly unjust.
sentences.cn: 生活多么离奇，多么莫测，多么不公啊！

sentences.en: It is unjust and unlawful to discriminate against people of other races.
sentences.cn: 歧视外族人是不公正的,也是违法的.

sentences.en: It was unjust of them not to hear my side.
sentences.cn: 他们不听我这方面的意见,这不公正.

sentences.en: It'seemed to relieve him of any unjust implication of sentiment.
sentences.cn: 这好象替他开脱了感情中任何不正当的成分.

sentences.en: Miss Su's condemnation of Fang Hung - chien for being shameless was actually unjust.
sentences.cn: 苏小姐骂方鸿 渐 无耻,实在是冤枉.

sentences.en: None want to die in an unjust war.
sentences.cn: 谁也不愿为非正义战争卖命.

sentences.en: The attack on Charles was deeply unjust.
sentences.cn: 对查尔斯的攻击甚为不公。

sentences.en: The law, in its present form, is unjust; it needs modification.
sentences.cn: 现行的法律是不公正的; 它需要修改.

sentences.en: The unjust peace agreement set the scene for another war.
sentences.cn: 这项不公平的和约为另一场战争埋下了祸根.

sentences.en: The unjust Stamp Act must be annulled.
sentences.cn: 必须废止这个不公正的印花税案。

sentences.en: Those who are unjust in their manner of doing things lose the support of the people.
sentences.cn: 办事不公的人不得人心.

words.tran_cn: 不正当的,不应得的,不合理的,过度的

trans.tran_cn: 不公平的，非正义的，不讲信用的
